1 #include "lib/rois.h"
2 
3 rois::rois ()
4 {
5  // directory with roi coodinate files
6  string roi_dir_str = "";
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/roi_dir", roi_dir_str, roi_dir_str);
8 
9  // no roi files
10  if (roi_dir_str.empty()) {
11  ROS_ERROR("No directory for ROI files given!");
12  return;
13  }
14 
15  // iterate all files in given directory
16  try {
17  // path relative to this ros package
18  filesystem::path package_dir = package::getPath("area_provider");
19  filesystem::path roi_dir = roi_dir_str;
20  filesystem::path roi_dir_abs = package_dir / roi_dir;
21 
22  // iterate all files
23  for(auto const& roi_file : filesystem::directory_iterator{roi_dir_abs}) {
24  string roi_file_name = roi_file.path().filename().string();
25 
26  try {
27  // convert file contents to json object
28  ifstream roi_stream(roi_file.path().string());
29  json roi_json;
30  roi_stream >> roi_json;
31 
32  // invalid plan file
33  if (roi_json.contains("fileType") == false or roi_json["fileType"] != "Plan") {
34  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: not a qGroundControl plan file!", roi_file_name.c_str());
35  continue;
36  }
37  if (roi_json.contains("mission") == false or roi_json["mission"].contains("items") == false or roi_json["mission"]["items"].size() < 3) {
38  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: no mission specified!", roi_file_name.c_str());
39  continue;
40  }
41 
42  // extract coordinates
43  ROS_DEBUG("Extract ROI coordinates from %s...", roi_file_name.c_str());
44  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> coords;
45  for (auto c : roi_json["mission"]["items"]) {
46  if (c["params"].size() < 7) {
47  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: number of params must be 7!", roi_file_name.c_str());
48  break;
49  }
50  geometry_msgs::Point coord;
51  coord.x = c["params"][4];
52  coord.y = c["params"][5];
53  coord.z = c["params"][6];
54  coords.push_back(coord);
55  }
56 
57  // create roi object
58  if (coords.size()) {
59  roi roi(coords);
60  ROS_INFO("Added ROI #%lu from %s: %lu coordinates", regions.size(), roi_file_name.c_str(), coords.size());
61  regions.emplace(regions.size(), roi);
62  }
63  }
64 
65  catch (json::exception &e) {
66  ROS_DEBUG("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: %s", roi_file_name.c_str(), e.what());
67  }
68  }
69  }
70 
71  catch (filesystem::filesystem_error &e) {
72  ROS_ERROR("Cannot read ROI files from %s: %s", roi_dir_str.c_str(), e.what());
73  }
74 
75  if (regions.size() < 1) {
76  ROS_ERROR("No ROIs specified!");
77  }
78 }

nlohmann::json json
